turns.speaker: TANNER
turns.text: That's why they told you you can't go inside.  They can't have you running into her.

turns.speaker: KATIE
turns.text: You said we were on the same programming team.

turns.speaker: KATIE
turns.text: But I don't know anything about programming.

turns.speaker: TANNER
turns.text: Once they digitized you, they added it.

turns.speaker: TANNER
turns.text: To see how long it would take for me to realize.

turns.speaker: LAWYER
turns.text: Care to tell us how you came into possession of an illegal access program?

turns.speaker: KID
turns.text: Look, I'm doing mute 'till I have a mouthpiece here who's on my side.

turns.speaker: LAWYER
turns.text: You don't need a lawyer.  We found the program on your laptop.

turns.speaker: KID
turns.text: Don't know what you're talking about.

turns.speaker: LAWYER
turns.text: Of course you do.  And the only shot you've got of keeping your ass from sinking in a sea of shit is to tell me where you got this program.

turns.speaker: KID
turns.text: My uni-net account.  I log on.  The program's there.

turns.speaker: KID
turns.text: Don't know what you're talking about.

turns.speaker: LAWYER
turns.text: Of course you do.  And the only shot you've got of keeping your ass from sinking in a sea of shit is to tell me where you got this program.

turns.speaker: TANNER
turns.text: Transmit copy of program via satellite north uplink.

turns.speaker: TANNER
turns.text: Select uplink for Federal Communications Office.  Department of Enforcement.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: Wait a second...  What time is it?

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: It's passing over earth as we speak!  Trajectory coordinates are 009843.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: We get Ivan into the Comets PATH--

turns.speaker: AISHA
turns.text: Alpha.  Is there any way we can defeat this  monster?  Any way at all?

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: ... Perhaps there is a way... I have heard tales of another power.

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: It's far too dangerous.  Zordon would never allow it.

turns.speaker: AISHA
turns.text: If we don't try, Zordon won't survive!

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: Ay, yi, yi, yi.  The legend speaks of a Master Warrior who lives on the planet Phaedos... This is the only person who knows the secrets of the power.

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: Rangers...  I'm afraid you're too late.

turns.speaker: AISHA
turns.text: So how can we get to it?

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: The only way to obtain the power is to achieve the highest state of being...

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: He wants to know if you'd like a cube of sugar in your tea.

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: In the language of the Nathadians, "Nin" stands for "man", "jetti" stands for "animal".  Ninjetti  - man and animal, together as one.  Now, put your hands inside the flame.

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: Now tell me... what do you see?

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: Aisha, you are the Bear, stalwart and bold.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: I'll be at the Observatory Sunday.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: Outside of his time warp he's aging at a vastly acellerated rate!

turns.speaker: AISHA
turns.text: I've never been this sore in my life.

turns.speaker: AISHA
turns.text: We've come all this way for a rock wall?!

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: There should be a way to open it.

turns.speaker: AISHA
turns.text: Release the power with the power.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: I've got it!  We use the mirrors to reflect the light back into itself!!

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: ... Let's take a look over there.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Let's teach these vermin a few manners.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Release the power WITH the power.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Everybody hold on tight.  We're gonna send this sucker into OBLIVION!

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: In a place that came to be known as Angel Grove.

turns.speaker: ZORDON
turns.text: The chamber has been accidently UNCOVERED!  You must return it to the depths. or  anyone should open it and Ivan is released!

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: To assist you I have retro-fitted your helmets with new Opti-Scan devices.

turns.speaker: ZORDON
turns.text: Use extreme caution, Rangers. You are dealing with an evil here that is beyond ALL comprehension.

turns.speaker: ZORDON
turns.text: Alpha, my sensors tell me the Rangers were too late!  Ivan is on his way here!

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: Hey, NOBODY enters the Command Center without a power coin!

turns.speaker: ZORDON
turns.text: ... Alpha, I am deeply concerned about the Rangers...

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: I told them it was too dangerous, but they wouldn't listen.

turns.speaker: ZORDON
turns.text: ... We must try to communicate with them.

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: By bouncing ultra-high frequencies off one of the network satellites, I can send a long-range pulsar signal to within TWO FEET of the Rangers coordinates.

turns.speaker: ZORDON
turns.text: ... I just pray we're not too late.

turns.speaker: ALPHA 5
turns.text: Ay, yi, yi!  The Rangers are going to be CRUSHED!

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: It is said that to those who possess the Power... all things are possible.

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: In another time, another dimension.  It was brought here long ago by the "Nathadians", a people who are now all but extinct. They built an impenetrable stone Monolith to store the power and keep it from their enemies.  For thousands of years, beings from all over the Universe have tried to obtain it... ALL have perished.

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: Close.  Billy, you are the Wolf, cunning and swift.

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: It is said that once you've reached the power... you have only ten triacs to release it.

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: About twenty seconds in your time.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: I am the wolf, cunning and swift!

turns.speaker: KIMBERLY
turns.text: I am the crane, agile and sublime!

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: Of course!  The power is of another world.  Another dimension.

turns.speaker: KIMBERLY
turns.text: WE'VE GOT TEN TRIACS BEFORE WE'RE TOAST!!

turns.speaker: KIMBERLY
turns.text: This guy is messing with the wrong teenagers!

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: That's the only way to the Monolith...

turns.speaker: ROCKY
turns.text: Release the power with the power.

turns.speaker: BILLY
turns.text: THREE DEGREES OFF THE COMETS TRAJECTORY!

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: Listen, we appreciate your hospitality, but we really don't have much time.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: WE HAVE TO GET OUT OF HERE!!

turns.speaker: BULK
turns.text: The Stealth Eagle is about to fly.

turns.speaker: BULK
turns.text: Be the eagle.  Be the eagle.

turns.speaker: SKULL
turns.text: Be the swallow.  Be the swallow...

turns.speaker: BULK
turns.text: The earth was hurtling toward us at seven hundred miles per hour, and we knew at that moment that we were facing death straight in the eye.

turns.speaker: SKULL
turns.text: Bulk... why don't we give Mr. Peep here a chance to think it over?

turns.speaker: SKULL
turns.text: Uh... that's classified, top secret, confidential, undercover information.

turns.speaker: BULK
turns.text: If we told you -- we'd have to kill you.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: And how do we do that?

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: By learning the ancient art of Ninjetti.  It is the Genesis of what you on earth have come to know as the Ninja.  It is the perfect union of mind, body and spirit.

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: Tommy, you are the Falcon, Winged Lord of the Sky.

turns.speaker: TOMMY
turns.text: And how do we release the power?

turns.speaker: DULCEA
turns.text: The legend goes that you release the power with the power.

turns.speaker: GOLDAR
turns.text: We never liked the cheesedongs in the first place.

turns.speaker: MORDANT
turns.text: Couldn''t stand them -- low-class all the way.  And did you catch a whiff of their BREATH?!  It's like having a conversation with a couple of ONIONS!  Not to mention...

turns.speaker: MORDANT
turns.text: What kind of landing was that?! These clowns are a menace to the sky

turns.speaker: MORDANT
turns.text: As soon as we've taken over the world I'm gonna change my name to Sir Mordant.  Or how about MAJOR Mordant?!

turns.speaker: GOLDAR
turns.text: SECOND COUSIN, THREE TIMES REMOVED.  NOW  GET OFF ME!

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: Taking over the world is one thing.  It's finding good help to run it for you that's the killer.

turns.speaker: GOLDAR
turns.text: You want me to place a few calls?

turns.speaker: GOLDAR
turns.text: No offense, boss, but they might find you a little disgusting.

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: Yes, well, I suppose you'd know a little something about that.  Not to worry.  I'll ever so gently lure them in and mold them into an army of devils!  And what better way to entice them ... than with a little Ivan's Ooze?!

turns.speaker: GOLDAR
turns.text: But boss, what about their parents?

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: Ah, the old and doddering.  I'm going to SCOURGE their puny minds, reducing them to ZOMBIE'S. And then I'll put them to work rebuilding my empire.

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: THE BOYS ARE BACK IN TOWN!!!

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: Mordant, go with them and report back to me!

turns.speaker: MORDANT
turns.text: You know boss, I'd really like to help out but I've got this gastronomic condition which rules out all space trave--

turns.speaker: MORDANT
turns.text: That's right.  And then we threw one of them off a mountain and another one into a raqing river!

turns.speaker: MORDANT
turns.text: Well... we were about to finish them off... when this huge monster came out of nowhere!

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: Did these sticks make a whistling sound?

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: Dulcea!  That miserable, manipulating loathsome she-devil of a WITCH!!

turns.speaker: IVAN
turns.text: Feast your eyes upon the exoskeleton of the barbaric HORNITOR!  KEEP DIGGING.  THE DREADFUL SCORPITRON SHOULD BE CLOSE BY.  ONCE I HAVE MY ECTO-MORPHICON MACHINES UP AND RUNNING, I SHALL ANNIHILATE ANGEL GROVE... AND THEN... THE WORLD

turns.speaker: ZEDD
turns.text: Don't you ever have anything nice to say?!

turns.speaker: RITA
turns.text: Well, if I did I certainly wouldn't say it to you!
